{"step_by_step_thinking": "The pulp proper is a part of the dental pulp, which is a part of the immune system. Both T lymphocytes and B lymphocytes are types of white blood cells that play a crucial role in the immune response. T lymphocytes are responsible for cell-mediated immunity, while B lymphocytes are responsible for humoral immunity. Therefore, both types of lymphocytes can be found in the pulp proper.", "answer_choice": "C"}
